title: Basilisk: Kouga Ninpou Chou (Basilisk)
synopsis: For centuries, the Iga and Kouga ninja clans have engaged in a bitter war. But when a ceasefire is ordered by the powerful warlord Ieyasu Tokugawa, the two clans are forced to put down their arms.
characters: ['Kouga, Gennosuke', 'Iga, Oboro', 'Yakushiji, Tenzen', 'Hotarubi', 'Kisaragi, Saemon', 'Muroga, Hyouma', 'Yashamaru', 'Akeginu', 'Chikuma, Koshirou', 'Kagerou']
voices: ['Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Mizuki, Nana', 'Hayami, Show', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Ueda, Youji', 'Miyabayashi, Yasushi', 'Yanagi, Naoki', 'Watanabe, Misa', 'Hatano, Wataru', 'Hayamizu, Risa']
